title: (x) 70s Yakuza movie logo - custom designed {Mikey D}
content:
Does anyone recognize this font? It’s from Bob Peak’s YAKUZA movie poster from 1975.  
Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/yakuza_5827.gif)
author: kiarostami

comments.content: Entirely different pedigree, but with similar forms: [FF Matinee Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20070304025326/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.10464.2.9&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=YAKUZA&sampleSize=48)
